summary: The gang's vacation to Paris takes a wrong turn when Scooby and Shaggy miss their flight and end up on a skydiving expedition in the Himalayas. To make matters worse, upon arrival they must outrun the Abominable Snowmonster.
cast: Frank Welker|Casey Kasem|Mindy Cohn|Grey Griffin|Rene Auberjonois|James Hong|Jeff Bennett|Kim Mai Guest|James Sie|Alfred Molina
keywords: exclamation point in title|comma in title|direct to video|snow|footprint
title: ¡Scooby-Doo!: El abominable hombre de las nieves
